code:
flowchart LR
    %% Main Project Structure
    A[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    B[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    C[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    D[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    E[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    F[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    %% App Architecture
    B --> G[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    G --> H[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    G --> I[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    G --> J[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    G --> K[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    G --> L[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    G --> M[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    %% Core Components
    H --> H1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    H --> H2[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    %% Domain Components
    I --> I1[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    I --> I2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    %% Features
    J --> J1[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    J --> J2[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    J --> J3[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    %% Feature Details
    J1 --> J1A[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    J1 --> J1B[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    J2 --> J2A[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    J2 --> J2B[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    J3 --> J3A[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    J3 --> J3B[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    %% Infrastructure
    K --> K1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    K1 --> K1A[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    K1 --> K1B[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    K1 --> K1C[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    %% Interfaces
    L --> L1[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    L --> L2[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    L --> L3[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    %% Templates Structure
    D --> D1[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    D --> D2[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    D --> D3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    D --> D4[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    D --> D5[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    %% Static Files
    C --> C1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    C --> C2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    %% Testing
    E --> E1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    E --> E2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Data Flow
    N[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    N --> N1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    N --> N2[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    N --> N3[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    N --> N4[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    N --> N5[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    N --> N6[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    N --> N7[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    N --> N8[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    %% Architecture Patterns
    O[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    O --> O1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    O --> O2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    O --> O3[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    O --> O4[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    O --> O5[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    O --> O6[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Technology Stack
    P[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    P --> P1[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    P --> P2[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    P --> P3[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    P --> P4[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    P --> P5[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    P --> P6[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    P --> P7[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    P --> P8[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    P --> P9[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Key Concepts
    Q[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    Q --> Q1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Q --> Q2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    Q --> Q3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Q --> Q4[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Deployment
    R[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    R --> R1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    R --> R2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Learning Path
    S[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    S --> S1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    S --> S2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    S --> S3[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    S --> S4[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    S --> S5[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    S --> S6[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    S --> S7[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    %% Main connections
    A --> B
    A --> C
    A --> D
    A --> E
    A --> F

    %% Data flow connections
    N1 --> N2 --> N3 --> N4 --> N5 --> N6
    N6 --> N5 --> N4 --> N3 --> N7 --> N8

    %% Styling
    style A fill:#FF6B6B,stroke:#FF6B6B,color:#FFFFFF
    style G fill:#4ECDC4,stroke:#4ECDC4,color:#FFFFFF
    style N fill:#45B7D1,stroke:#45B7D1,color:#FFFFFF
    style O fill:#96CEB4,stroke:#96CEB4,color:#FFFFFF
    style P fill:#FFEAA7,stroke:#FFEAA7,color:#000000
    style Q fill:#DDA0DD,stroke:#DDA0DD,color:#FFFFFF
    style R fill:#98D8C8,stroke:#98D8C8,color:#FFFFFF
    style S fill:#F7DC6F,stroke:#F7DC6F,color:#000000
